title.narrative: Cultivated plant protection lines for Ko?e Pyahu and El Triunfo rural communities against pesticides of agricultural industry

description.narrative: In the project plant protection lines will be cultivated to protect Ko?e Pyahu and El Triunfo rural communities from pesticides used in surrounding soya plantations. The aim is to prevent the spreading of pesticides that are hazardous to health and environ ment protect the land from erosion and reduce nutrition loads in water resources. These protection lines will be cultivated with area's own natural vegetation and trees that have been vastly cut down to make room for agribusiness. The protection lines safe guard community members' health autarchy and small scale cultivations and mitigate ecological economic and social problems caused by the agribusiness. By enhancing living conditions and possibilities in the communities the objective is to reduce poverty an d prevent forced migration into urban centers. The community members will be also given capacitation of environmental laws and the importance of environmental protection and civil activism.
